bike.description: �06 Fuse 16, Cr-Mo ST, threaded Euro BB, tig weldeded, formed DT/TT, internally relieved head tube w/ stamped logo and weld-on rotor plate, wrap gusset BB yoke, seat-stay mounted U-brake bosses, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle

components.description: 1-1/8" threadless, 2mm thick Hi-Ten steerereer, 1.4mm Hi-Ten 1-1/4" blades, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle
Hi-Ten, 580mm width, 150mm rise, 10 deg. backsweep, 5 deg. upsweep
Specialized Kraton, file pattern w/ flange
Dia Tech 997 "Magic" w/ soft compond pads
KMC Z-510 1/2x1/8", anti drop inner links
Fuse forged and CNC cut 30t forged alloy
Specialized Alloy platform, molded pins, 9/16" Cr-Mo axle
Fuse double sealed, loose ball, mid flange, solid 14mm axle
Fuse alloy Flip-side L&R side drive, 36h w/ solid 14mm axle
Owners manual, Chainguard, reflectors, 2x steel axle pegs w/anti-spin hardware
